Package com.dua3.utility.fx.controls

Class Dialogs

java.lang.Object
com.dua3.utility.fx.controls.Dialogs
public final class Dialogs extends Object
Utility class for creating various types of dialogs and panes.

    • openFile

      public static <T> Optional<T> openFile(javafx.stage.Stage stage, Class<T> type, @Nullable FileType<? extends T> defaultFileType) throws IOException
      Opens a file selection dialog for the user to choose a file, with support for filtering by file types. The selected file is then read and returned wrapped in an Optional, or Optional.empty() if no file is chosen. If the file type is unsupported or cannot be determined, an Dialogs.UnsupportedFileTypeException is thrown.
      Type Parameters:
      T - The type of object that the selected file will be read into.
      Parameters:
      stage - The parent Stage for the file chooser dialog.
      type - The class type of the objects to read from the selected file.
      defaultFileType - The default file type to preselect in the file chooser, or null if no default is specified.
      Returns:
      An Optional containing an object of type T read from the selected file, or an empty Optional if no file is selected.
      Throws:
      IOException - If an I/O error occurs while reading the selected file.
      Dialogs.UnsupportedFileTypeException - If the type of the selected file cannot be determined or is unsupported.

    • createExtensionFilter

      public static <T> javafx.stage.FileChooser.ExtensionFilter createExtensionFilter(FileType<? extends T> ft)
      Creates a new FileChooser.ExtensionFilter instance based on the provided FileType.
      Type Parameters:
      T - The type that this file type can handle.
      Parameters:
      ft - The file type containing the name and extension patterns to be used for the filter.
      Returns:
      A new FileChooser.ExtensionFilter with the specified name and extension patterns.

    • saveToFile

      public static <T> boolean saveToFile(javafx.stage.Stage stage, T object, @Nullable FileType<? extends T> defaultFileType, @Nullable Path defaultPath) throws IOException
      Opens a file save dialog to allow the user to save the given object to a file. The dialog allows filtering by supported file types and preselects a default file type if specified. The method writes the object's data to the selected file in the appropriate format.
      Type Parameters:
      T - The type of object to be saved.
      Parameters:
      stage - The parent Stage for the file chooser dialog.
      object - The object to be saved to a file.
      defaultFileType - The default file type to preselect in the file chooser, or null if no default is specified.
      defaultPath - The default path to preselect in the file chooser, or null if no default is specified.
      Returns:
      true if the object was successfully saved to a file; false if the user canceled the operation.
      Throws:
      IOException - If an I/O error occurs during file saving.
      Dialogs.UnsupportedFileTypeException - If the type of the file cannot be determined or is unsupported.
